resources.string: The Creen is built around the idea of futuristic approach to improve the current state of Pakistan. Not more than 35 years ago, cities like Islamabad and Lahore were a pleasant to visit. While,Belgium and London were one of the most polluted cities in the world. If they can change it, why canâ€™t we? Similarly, this is pointed towards the youth of this country, who are capable enough to turn the tides for a better future of their beloved homeland. This would give every citizen of Pakistan to play his vital role in improving the state of Pakistan.

Creen works as a bridge between Government offices and the citizens of Pakistan. It will allow citizens to send their complaints directly to the government offices. No more queuing around, waiting for applications to post or visiting the offices to follow up for your issue. But its scope is not limited to that, Our mission is to Educate, Motivate and Activate the civil society, especially the youth for the Cleaner, Greener, Healthier environment and Educated Pakistan.
